articles.title: Menopause: How can women take care of their skin in their 50s and beyond - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In this instalment of CNA Women’s series on menopause, we look at how fluctuating hormones affect the skin, what products you should use and avoid, and how to keep your skin healthy and strong.
articles.content:
The skin is the largest organ you have, and it changes with age, including during menopause, when oestrogen levels decline rapidly.
The dip doesnt happen suddenly it would have started after you hit… [+1014 chars]
